article_title: Teladoc Numbers Show Virtual Doctor Care No Passing Fad

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: In its first quarter as a publicly-traded company, Teladoc (TDOC) showed “virtual patient visits” increased a whopping 104% compared to the same period a year ago, boosting already bullish expectations for the year. Teladoc is part of a parade of telehealth vendors that are signing deals with employers and some of [...]
